channel.title: Tops on Ali Pirani
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Ali Pirani

item.description: Hi, I am not sure how to introduce my area of expertise - Bioinformaticist/Bioinformatician/Bioinformagician, Bioinformatics Analyst or Software engineer. I believe my strength lies somewhere between these terms and I am on a constant quest to leverage these skills in developing innovative strategies to improve public health. I work in Snitkin Lab at University of Michigan and my main focus is to build automatic workflows to process and analyze huge genomics data on shared, Linux-based high performance computing environment.
